blogPost.title: The S&P 500 is crashing right now thanks to Tesla, which is responsible for 0.12% of its 0.44% decline.
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text: S&P 500指数现在正在崩溃，这要归功于特斯拉，它要为其0.44%的跌幅负责0.12%。
S&P 500指數現在正在崩潰，這要歸功於特斯拉，它要爲其0.44%的跌幅負責0.12%。

previous.excerpt:
2nd September 2020 - 24th September 2020: the S&P 500 dropped 9.33%

23rd October 2020 - 30th October 2020: It dropped 5.64%

16th November, it rallied 11% from the 30th October

If you'd invested on 2nd September, it would've taken you till November 13th to
go green again.

Now that's just the…
